LanguageData.Paralyze.label: paralysis
LanguageData.Paralyze.description: A temporary loss or impairment of voluntary movement, caused by electric damage done to the nerves.
LanguageData.Paralyze.stages.0.label: dizzy
LanguageData.Paralyze.stages.1.label: partial
LanguageData.Paralyze.stages.2.label: severe
LanguageData.Paralyze.stages.3.label: blackout
